    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    JaxRsHandler
    Vert.x web handler that delegates requests to RESTeasy.
    JsonArrayMessageBodyReader
    Jakarta JAX-RS MessageBodyReader for Vert.x JsonArray.
    JsonArrayMessageBodyWriter
    Jakarta JAX-RS MessageBodyWriter for Vert.x JsonArray.
    JsonObjectMessageBodyReader
    Jakarta JAX-RS MessageBodyReader for Vert.x JsonObject.
    JsonObjectMessageBodyWriter
    Jakarta JAX-RS MessageBodyWriter for Vert.x JsonObject.
    LoggingContainerRequestFilter
    JAX-RS filter to log requests.
    LoggingContainerResponseFilter
    JAX-RS filter to log responses.
    OpenApiHandler
    Vert.x web handler for outputting openapi definitions based on RestEasy Jax-RS endpoints.
    OpenApiHandler.UiHandler
    The Vertx handler for converting a request into an HTML page that uses OpenAPI-Explorer to reference /openapi.yaml.
    RoutingContextInjector
    ContextProvider to inject the Vert.x web routing context into JAX-RS resources.
    TimerContainerRequestFilter
    JAX-RS filter to set up metrics on the request context.
    TimerContainerResponseFilter
    JAX-RS filter to complete metrics on the request context.
